nucky.share
Class Talk

java.lang.Object
  nucky.share.Talk

public class Talk
extends java.lang.Object

A class that allows to share string messages with other sketches over a web server. The library requires a PHP/SQL server with the share library PHP scripts, and the SQL table properly installed.

Author:
Nucky

Constructor Detail

Talk

public Talk(processing.core.PApplet parent,
            java.lang.String url,
            int talkId)
     throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Creates a Talk object that send and receive string messages. This will try to get new messages every 30 seconds.

Parameters:
parent - Parent PApplet (Processing Sketch) (usually this)
url - URL to the HTTP server where the Share PHP scripts are installed
talkId - ID of the talk > 0 (some kind of channel id)
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - if there was an error parsing the given URL
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if talkId <= 0

Talk

public Talk(processing.core.PApplet parent,
            java.lang.String url,
            int talkId,
            long refreshRate)
     throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Creates a Talk object that send and receive ciphered string messages. This will try to get new messages every refreshRate miliseconds.

Parameters:
parent - Parent PApplet (Processing Sketch) (usually this)
url - URL to the HTTP server where the Share PHP scripts are installed
talkId - ID of the talk > 0 (some kind of channel id)
refreshRate - delay to periodically connect to the server and read new messages (in miliseconds)
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - if there was an error parsing the given URL
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if talkId <= 0
Method Detail

sendMessage

public boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String messageToSend)
Returns true if the given string message was sent to the server

Parameters:
messageToSend - string to share
Returns:
true if the message was successfully sent

pre

public void pre()
Calls the event handler method receivedMessage

getMessages

public java.lang.String[] getMessages()
Returns an array containing all received message at the time of the invocation.

Returns:
A string array containing all the messages received.

dispose

public void dispose()
